definitions.text: the property of having two dimensions
a want of animation or brilliance
examples: the almost self-conscious flatness of Hemingway's style
it needed lemon juice to sharpen the flatness of the dried lentils

definitions.text: the property of having little or no contrast; lacking highlights or gloss
inactivity; showing an unusual lack of energy
examples: the general appearance of sluggishness alarmed his friends
